English: The government has constructed better health centers in rural areas.
Acoli: Gamente oyubo odi yadi mabeco ikin gang.
Luganda: Gavumenti ezimbye amalwaliro agasingako obulungi mu bitundu by'ebyalo.
Lumasaaba: Linamboo Lyombekhele kamakangillo kamalayi mubyalo
Runyakore: Gavumenti eyombekire amarwariro amarungi omu byaro.
Kiswahili: Serikali imejenga vituo bora vya afya  vijijini.

English: His death was so sudden.
Acoli: Toone obedo atura.
Luganda: Enfa ye yali ya kibwatukira.
Lumasaaba: Khuufwa khwe Khwobele Khwokhangu
Runyakore: Akafa ekitaraariraine.
Kiswahili: Kifo chake kilikuwa ghafla.

English: Our company celebrated twenty years of existence last year.
Acoli: Kampuniwa okwero mwaka pyere aryo me rii.
Luganda: Omwaka oguwedde kampuni yaffe yajaguza emyaka amakumi abiri.
Lumasaaba: Sitongoole syeffe syekhoyele kimiko kabili kye burambi kumwiko kubirire
Runyakore: Kampuni yaitu ekajaguza emyaka makumi abiri, ey'obuhereza, omwaka oguhwaire.
Kiswahili: Kampuni yetu ilisherehekea miaka ishirini ya  kuwepo mwaka jana.

English: Many people have lost their lives due to sexually transmitted diseases.
Acoli: Dano mapol gurwenyo kwogi pi two makobo ki ibuto.
Luganda: Abantu bangi abafudde olw'endwadde z'ekikaba.
Lumasaaba: Bbabandu bakaalii bafwiile khulwe bulwale bwe khu tubaana (indwasii)
Runyakore: Abantu baingi bafiire ahabw'endwara z'obushambani.
Kiswahili: Watu wengi wamepoteza maisha yao  kwa sababu ya magonjwa ya zinaa.

English: Civil servants receive their pension fund upon retirement.
Acoli: Lutic pa gamente gigamo centegi me pencon ka guweko tic.
Luganda: Abakozi ba gavumenti bafuna akasiimo kaabwe nga bawummudde.
Lumasaaba: Barambi be Linambo baba wumula kye linambo bafuna sisinza sye lipesi lyesi bafunatsaka
Runyakore: Abakozi ba gavumenti nibatunga akasiimo kaabo ku barikuhuumura.
Kiswahili: Wafanyikazi wa umma wanapokea  fedha zao za pensheni juu ya kustaafu.

English: Teachers are also among civil servants.
Acoli: Lupwonye bene lutic pa gamente.
Luganda: N'abasomesa nabo bakozi ba gavumenti.
Lumasaaba: Bbalekelaa nabbo barambi bbe linambo
Runyakore: Abashomesa nabo nibabarirwa omu bakozi ba gavumenti.
Kiswahili: Walimu pia ni miongoni mwa watumishi wa umma.

English: There is a high rate of crime in our village.
Acoli: Timo bal tye lamal mada  i caro mewa.
Luganda: Ku kyalo kyaffe obumenyi bw'amateeka bungi ddala.
Lumasaaba: Aliwoo butsonwakki bukali khusyalo syeffe
Runyakore: Ebihagaro byeyongyeire omu kyaro kyaitu.
Kiswahili: Kuna kiwango cha juu cha uhalifu katika kijiji chetu.

English: Our town has been peaceful for many years.
Acoli: Taunwa obedo ki kuc pi mwaka mapol.
Luganda: Ekibuga kyaffe kibaddemu emirembe okumala emyaka egiwera.
Lumasaaba: Sirimba syeffe syabelle ni luukosi lukali kimiko kimikali
Runyakore: Orurembo rwaitu rutwire rwine obusingye kumara emyaka mingi.
Kiswahili: Jiji letu limekuwa na amani kwa miaka mingi.

English: Some places are not safe during nighttime.
Acoli: Kabedo mukene pe ber idyewor.
Luganda: Ebyokwerinda ekiro mu bifo ebimu si birungi.
Lumasaaba: Aliwoo biffo bikhalii bilayii taa mubwille bwe musiloo/ angolobe
Runyakore: Emyanya emwe n'ey'akabi kahango omu kiro.
Kiswahili: Maeneo mengine sio salama wakati wa usiku.

English: The parliament passes various laws every year.
Acoli: Ot moko cik moko cik madwong mwaka ki mwaka.
Luganda: Paliyamenti eyisa amateeka ag'enjawulo buli mwaka.
Lumasaaba: Sirekere sisipilisa kamakambila ke linambo sibirisa kamakambila buli mwakha
Runyakore: Eishengyero nirihinguza ebiragiro bitari bimwe na bimwe buri mwaka.
Kiswahili: Bunge hupitisha sheria mbali mbali kila mwaka.

English: She is the heir to her late grandmother.
Acoli: En aye lale kaka lyeli adane.
Luganda: Ye musika wa nnyina.
Lumasaaba: Namukhanaa oyo niyee umusikhaa wo kukhu wewe
Runyakore: Niwe yaasikiire nyinenkuru owaafiire.
Kiswahili: Yeye ndiye mrithi wa bibi yake marehemu.

English: A big number of people lack proper accommodation.
Acoli: Dano mapol pe tye ki kabedo maber.
Luganda: Abantu bangi tebalina bifo birungi we babeera.
Lumasaaba: Babandu bakalii si bali ni ekhukoona alayii taa
Runyakore: Omuhendo gw'abantu abaingi tibaine buraaro burungi.
Kiswahili: Idadi kubwa ya watu wanakosa malazi sahihi.

English: Their new house was completed within six months.
Acoli: Otgi manyen kityeko yubo ikare me dwe abicel.
Luganda: Ennyumba yaabwe empya baagizimbira mu  mywezi mukaaga.
Lumasaaba: Inzu yawe injjakhaa bamalile khukyombekhela mu myeesii kisesaba
Runyakore: Enju yaabo ensya bakagimariiriza omu bunaku bw'ameezi mukaaga.
Kiswahili: Nyumba yao mpya ilikamilishwa ndani ya kipindi cha miezi sita.

English: A lot of property is lost as a result of land conflicts.
Acoli: Jami mapol bale macalo adwogi me lara ngom.
Luganda: Ebintu bingi ebifa olw'obukuubagano bw'ettaka.
Lumasaaba: Bbibindu bikali byonekhela mubusayumba bubwama mukhupanila lilloba/lirome
Runyakore: Ebintu bingi nibibura ahabw'omuhondano gw'amataka.
Kiswahili: Mali nyingi hupotea kwa sababu ya mizozo ya ardhi.

English: Land conflicts are so common in many parts of the country.
Acoli: Lara ngom bene dwong ibut lobo man mapatpat.
Luganda: Obukuubagano bw'ettaka butera okubaawo mu bitundu by'eggwanga bingi.
Lumasaaba: Bisayumba bi byama kwhiloba/lirome bikali nabbi mwinambo
Runyakore: Omuhondano gw'amataka ni mwingi omu bicweka bingi by'eihanga.
Kiswahili: Migogoro ya ardhi ni ya kawaida sana katika sehemu nyingi za nchi.

English: This disciplinary committee is better than the previous one.
Acoli: Dul ma neno lok kom woro eni ber loyo dul ma okato angeci.
Luganda: Akakiiko akakwasisa empisa ke tulina kati kasinga kali akaliiwo.
Lumasaaba: Lukhikho lukangafulla luno lufuraa lulwamakho
Runyakore: Akakiiko akarikukurira emicwe akariho hati, nikarungi kukira akarugireho.
Kiswahili: Kamati hii ya nidhamu ni bora kuliko ile ya zamani.

English: Today's meeting has delayed starting.
Acoli: Kacokke matini orii kacake.
Luganda: Olukiiko lwaleero luluddewo okutandika.
Lumasaaba: Luubusano lwe syalelo lwa kelewelle
Runyakore: Orukiiko rw'eriizooba rwakyerererwa kutandika.
Kiswahili: Mkutano wa leo umechelewesha kuanza.

English: The number of cabinet ministers in the country has increased over the years.
Acoli: Wel kabinet minicita i lobo man omede imwaka man.
Luganda: Omuwendo gwa baminisita mu ggwanga guzze gweyongera mu myaka gino.
Lumasaaba: Bbakoosi babekhala khunasitsolongo nga barangilila biffo bye burawa byesi umukhulu we linambo abawa khurangilila beyongele bukali
Runyakore: Omuhendo gw'abaaminisita  omu ihanga gugumire nigweyongyera buri mwaka.
Kiswahili: Idadi ya mawaziri wa baraza la mawaziri nchini imeongezeka zaidi ya miaka.

English: Most industrial waste products destroy the environment.
Acoli: Pol yugi ma aa ki ii cuma yubo jami balo kabedo ma orumowa.
Luganda: Kasasiro asinga okuva mu makolero ayonoona obutonde bw'ensi.
Lumasaaba: Bibyama mu makholelo nga byawelekho kumukaso byoneka bikhwibotokhelela
Runyakore: Kasasiro nyingi erikuruga omu makorero neeshiisha ebyobuhangwa ebitwehinguririize.
Kiswahili: Bidhaa nyingi za taka za viwandani huharibu mazingira.

English: Shops have a variety of packaging materials.
Acoli: Dukan tye ki jami mapol ma patpat me boc.
Luganda: Amaduuka galina ebisabika by'ebintu eby'enjawulo.
Lumasaaba: Kamakulanilo kali ni bikali bye khubweyelamo
Runyakore: Amaduuka gaine eby'okukomamu ebintu eby'emiringo mingi.
Kiswahili: Duka zina vifaa mbali mbali vya ufungaji.

English: Some people's language is difficult to understand.
Acoli: Niang leb pa dano mogo tek.
Luganda: Abantu abamu balina olulimi oluzibu okutegeera.
Lumasaaba: Tsinimii tsyebabandu balala tsindala tsya aangalaa khumanya
Runyakore: Orurimi rw'abantu abamwe rugumire kwetegyereza.
Kiswahili: Lugha ya watu wengine ni ngumu kuelewa.

English: They made some amendments to their constitution yesterday.
Acoli: Guloko pen cikgi mogo laworo.
Luganda: Eggulo baakoze ennongoosereza mu ssemateeka waabwe.
Lumasaaba: Bayusilemo khuu makambila ka bafukka ingolobe
Runyakore: Nyomwebazyo bakozire empinduka omu  ngyenderwaho yaabo.
Kiswahili: Walifanya marekebisho kadhaa katika katiba yao jana.

English: Judges are the most important civil servants in the country.
Acoli: Lungol kop aye lutic pa gamente ma pirgi tek loyo i lobo kany.
Luganda: Abalamuzi be bakozi ba gavumenti abasinga obukulu mu ggwanga.
Lumasaaba: Bakayi nibo barambi bafurayo mwinambo
Runyakore: Abaramuzi nibo bakozi ba gavumenti abarikukizayo omugasho omu ihanga.
Kiswahili: Majaji ndio wafanyikazi  muhimu wa serikali  nchini.

English: Prices of commodities keep on changing every day.
Acoli: Wel jami tiko lokke nino duc.
Luganda: Emiwendo gy'ebintu gikyukakyuka buli lunaku.
Lumasaaba: Kampesi ke bikulwa kayukha bulibusyele
Runyakore: Emihendo y'ebintu neeguma neehindahinduka buriizooba.
Kiswahili: Bei ya bidhaa zinabadilika kila siku.

English: Banks offer loans to people.
Acoli: Bang miyo lim den ki dano.
Luganda: Bbanka ziwola abantu ssente.
Lumasaaba: Birekere bibikha ate byafuka kamamotoola/kamapesi bikopesa kamapsei isi babandu
Runyakore: Za banka nizihora abantu sente.
Kiswahili: Benki hutoa mikopo kwa watu.

English: Police officers arrested some criminals in our area this morning.
Acoli: Abili gumako lutim bal mogo i ikabedowa odiko man.
Luganda: Abaserikale bakutte abamenyi b'amateeka amakya ga leero.
Lumasaaba: Babalinda lukoosi khusisinza syeffe baambile bafuniaka kamakambila kumutikhinye syalelo
Runyakore: Abapooriisi baakwata enkozi z'ebibi omu kyaro kyaitu akasheeshe aka.
Kiswahili: Maafisa wa polisi walikamata wahalifu wengine katika eneo letu asubuhi ya leo.

English: Illegal possession of a gun is punishable by law.
Acoli: Bedo ki muduku ma cik pe ngeyo kipwodo ki cik.
Luganda: Okubeera n'emmundu etali mu mateeka kiviirako okubonerezebwa mu mateeka.
Lumasaaba: Khubba ni kumwi enelo aleyi nga suli ni bunyali khu khwama mu bakiiyila ,si khwamilakho bukhangafu mu makambila ke linambo
Runyakore: Okugira embundu omu muringo gutahikire nikihenda ebiragiro.
Kiswahili: Milki isiyo halali ya bunduki inaadhibiwa na sheria.

English: It requires you a good lawyer to win a court case.
Acoli: Loyo kot mito lapilida ma ocwiny.
Luganda: Kikwetaagisa okubeera ne looya omulungi okusobola okuwangula omusango mu kkooti.
Lumasaaba: Sikhukanisa umunamakambila umulayi niyo wafura kumusango
Runyakore: Nooyetenga kuba oine omuhoreereza murungi kusinga orubanja.
Kiswahili: Inakuhitaji wakili mzuri kushinda kesi ya korti.

English: Police officers are highly skilled in their work.
Acoli: Abili gucwiny mada iticgi.
Luganda: Abaserikale ba ppoliisi bakugu nnyo mu mulimu gwabwe.
Lumasaaba: Bbabalinda lukoosi bali ni bumanyilifu bukali mumilimo kyabwe
Runyakore: Abapooriisi baine obukugu bw'amaani  omu murimo gwabo.
Kiswahili: Maafisa wa polisi wana ujuzi sana katika kazi zao.

English: It is not easy to survive a case with clear evidence.
Acoli: Loyo kot ma cadene tye atir pe yot.
Luganda: Kizibu okusimattuka omusango oguliko obujulizi.
Lumasaaba: Sisili syangu khukhwifubarura/ khuoona kumusango kulikho byekhubonelakho taa
Runyakore: Ti kyorobi kusinga orubanja  orwine obuhame burikumara.
Kiswahili: Si rahisi kushinda kesi na ushahidi dhahiri

English: Oil is a very profitable item of trade world over.
Acoli: Moo tye gin ma kelo magoba mada i wilobo kulu.
Luganda: Amafuta kyamuguzi ekireeta amagoba agawerera ddala mu nsi yonna.
Lumasaaba: Kamafura kakama mwiloba kali ni kamafurisa kamakali musibala syosi
Runyakore: Amajuta n'eky'obuguzi bwingi omu by'obushuubuzi omunsi yoona.
Kiswahili: Mafuta ni bidhaa yenye faida sana ya biashara ulimwenguni kote.

English: The government has compensated the people who lost their land during the road expansion.
Acoli: Gamente oculo jo ma orwenyo ngomgi ikare me yabo ii gugu.
Luganda: Gavumenti eyiriridde abantu abaafiibwa ettaka lyabwe mu kugaziya oluguudo.
Lumasaaba: Linambo lyesilewo babandu baba fwila liloba lyabwe nga yombekha kimikhoosi
Runyakore: Gavumenti eshumbushire abantu abafeereirwe eitaka ryabo omu kuhangusya orukuuto.
Kiswahili: Serikali imelipa fidia watu waliopoteza ardhi wakati wa upanuzi wa barabara.

English: Tax officers closed a number of shops without trading licenses.
Acoli: Lucok mucoro oloro dukan mapol ma gipe ki lanycic me cat.
Luganda: Abeemisolo baggaddewo amaduuka agawera agabadde tegalina layisinsi.
Lumasaaba: Baba solosa kamawumule bekaale kamakulisilo kakhali ni lupapula lukafukilisa taa
Runyakore: Abashorooza b'omushoro bakingire amaduuka maingi agataine rayisensi.
Kiswahili: Maafisa wa ushuru walifunga maduka kadhaa bila leseni za biashara.

English: There are many smuggled goods in the country.
Acoli: Jami ma kikelo i alii dwong mada ilobo man.
Luganda: Ebyamaguzi ebikukuse bingi nnyo mu ggwanga.
Lumasaaba: Bikulwa bibingila mwinambo nga byewomele kumusolo bikali
Runyakore: Omu ihanga harimu ebintu bingi bya magyendo.
Kiswahili: Kuna bidhaa nyingi  ya magendo  nchini.

English: Almost all political parties have their headquarters in the capital city.
Acoli: Cok cok pati pa lucungo iwi bye ducu gitye ki gankalgi i citi.
Luganda: Kumpi ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi byonna birina ebitebe byabyo mu kibuga ekikulu.
Lumasaaba: Birekere bye buwuli bifura bukali mwinambo bili mu sirimba sikhulu
Runyakore: Haihi ebibiina by'eby'obutegyeki  byona biine ofiisi zaabyo enkuru omu kibuga kikuru ky'eihanga.
Kiswahili: Karibu vyama vyote vya siasa vina makao yao makuu katika mji mkuu.

English: Some leaders are not cooperative.
Acoli: Lutela mukene pe giwinye.
Luganda: Abakulembeze abamu tebaagala kukolera wamu.
Lumasaaba: Barangilisi babandi sibali ni burambi bwe atweela taa
Runyakore: Abeebembezi abamwe tibarikukunda okukwatanisa n'abandi.
Kiswahili: Viongozi wengine hawashirikiani

English: Other party members disagreed with the leaders' decision.
Acoli: Lumema me pati mukene pe gicwako tam pa lutela.
Luganda: Bannakibiina abalala tebakkaanyizza n'okusalawo kw'omukulembeze.
Lumasaaba: Bemwituuli babandi sibafukilisanile ni inkhalawo ye umurangilisi taa
Runyakore: Bamwe ahari baamemba b'ekibiina tibaraikirizaine n'encwamu y'abeebembezi.
Kiswahili: Washiriki wengine wa chama hawakubaliani na uamuzi wa viongozi.

English: Health workers play an important role in people's lives.
Acoli: Lutic me yotkom gitimo jami ma pirgi tego ikwo pa dano.
Luganda: Abeebyobulamu bakola omulimu munene mu bulamu bw'abantu.
Lumasaaba: Bebyebulamu bali ni sikaali syesi bakhoola mu bwebabandu
Runyakore: Abakozi b'eby'amagara nibakora omurimo muhango aha magara g'abantu.
Kiswahili: Wafanyikazi wa afya huchukua jukumu muhimu katika maisha ya watu.

English: Government should fully equip the labor wards in most public hospitals.
Acoli: Gamente myero oket jami mamite ducu i ot nywal i pol odi yen pa gamente.
Luganda: Gavumenti esaanye eteeke ebikozesebwa mu mazaaliro agasangibwa mu malwaliro ga gavumenti.
Lumasaaba: Linambo lyakha khura ibyo byosi bibikanibwa mumakangilo nadala isi bamayi basalila mumakangilo ke babandu
Runyakore: Gavumenti eshemereire kuta ebikozeso byona omu marwariro g'abazaarisa aga gavumenti.
Kiswahili: Serikali inapaswa kuandaa kikamilifu wodi za kazi katika hospitali nyingi za umma.

English: Poor communication hinders the development of an area.
Acoli: Rac pa kube ikin dano balo dongo lobo.
Luganda: Empuliziganya embi eremesa okukulaakulana kw'ekitundu.
Lumasaaba: Khulaa khurekeresana sikhasisa intsoatsoana musisinza
Runyakore: Eby'empurizana bibi nibigaruza enyima entunguuka omu kyanga.
Kiswahili: Mawasiliano duni huzuia maendeleo ya eneo.

English: The government gets financial support from other countries.
Acoli: Gamente nongo kony me lim ki bot lobo mukene.
Luganda: Gavumenti efuna obuyambi bw'ensimbi okuva mu mawanga amalala.
Lumasaaba: Linambo lifuna buyetti bwe kamawumule khukhwama mumanambo kakandi
Runyakore: Gavumenti neetunga obuhwezi bwa sente kuruga omu mahanga agandi.
Kiswahili: Serikali inapata msaada wa kifedha kutoka nchi zingine.

English: Sometimes people die innocently.
Acoli: Kare mukene dano too labongo bal.
Luganda: Oluusi abantu bafa nga tebalina musango.
Lumasaaba: Imbukka ikindi, babandu bafwa busaa/ nga mbawo syesi bakholele taa
Runyakore: Obumwe abantu nibafa bataine rubanja.
Kiswahili: Wakati mwingine watu hufa bila hatia.

English: Government officials deserve to have bodyguards.
Acoli: Lutic pa gamente opore me bedo ki acikari magwokogi.
Luganda: Abakungu bagavumenti basaana okufuna abakuumi.
Lumasaaba: Barambi be linambo bakha khuba ni baba linda
Runyakore: Abakozi ba gavumenti bashemereire kuba baine abaserukare abarikubakuuma.
Kiswahili: Maafisa wa serikali wanastahili kuwa na walinzi wa mwili.

English: There is poor security in our area.
Acoli: Ber bedo pe ber ikabedowa.
Luganda: Mu kitundu kyaffe mulimu obutali butebenkenvu.
Lumasaaba: Mu sifo syefwe bulindi sibuli bulayi taa.
Runyakore: Ekyaro kyaitu tikiine bukuumi bwona.
Kiswahili: Kuna usalama duni katika eneo letu.

English: Many African countries have experienced rebel attacks.
Acoli: Pol lobo me Africa adwi omonyogi.
Luganda: Amawanga ga Afirika mangi gaalimu obulumbaganyi bw'abayeekera.
Lumasaaba: Kamanambo ka Africa kafura bukali kakanane bakapanisa bakali
Runyakore: Amahanga maingi ga Afirika gaararumbirweho abaheekyera.
Kiswahili: Nchi nyingi za Kiafrika zimepata shambulio la waasi.

English: Wars lead to the loss of people's lives and property.
Acoli: Lweny kelo rwenyo kwo pa dano ki jami.
Luganda: Entalo ziviirako abantu okufa ate n'ebintu ebikalu.
Lumasaaba: Khuusolana khwamamo babandu khufwa ni bibindu khukhwonekha
Runyakore: Entaro nizirugamu okufeerwa abantu n'ebintu.
Kiswahili: Vita husababisha upotezaji wa maisha na mali ya watu.

English: Maize is one of the major food crops in Uganda.
Acoli: Lanywagi tye ikin cam ma pirgi tego i Uganda.
Luganda: Kasooli y'emu ku mmere enkulu mu Uganda.
Lumasaaba: Nasimya nisyo silimwa sitwela khubilimwa bilimibwa nabbi mu Uganda
Runyakore: Ebicoori ni kimwe aha bihingwa bikuru omuri Uganda.
Kiswahili: Mahindi ni moja wapo ya mazao makubwa ya chakula nchini Uganda.

English: Farmers have resorted to the use of machines to improve their yields.
Acoli: Lupur gudok katic ki macin wek camgi kucek maber.
Luganda: Abalimi batandise okukozesa ebyuma bibayambe okwongera ku makungula gaabwe.
Lumasaaba: Balimi barakikhile khurambisa bibyuma mu khulima niyo bamisemo bilayi
Runyakore: Abahingi/Abatungi bacwiremu kukozesa zaakarakita kwongyera aha mashaaruura gaabo.
Kiswahili: Wakulima wameamua matumizi ya mashine kuboresha mavuno yao.

English: Prices for agricultural products keep changing from time to time.
Acoli: Wel jami apura tiko loke kare ki kare.
Luganda: Emiwendo gy'ebirime gikyukakyuka buli kiseera.
Lumasaaba: kamapesi kakula bye bulimi kayukha bulimbuka.
Runyakore: Emihendo y'ebihingwa neeguma neehindahinduka buri kaanya.
Kiswahili: Bei za bidhaa za kilimo zinaendelea kubadilika mara kwa mara.

English: The Uganda national anthem has three stanzas.
Acoli: Lubara pa Uganda tye ki dul adek.
Luganda: Oluyimba lwa Uganda lulina ebitundu bisatu.
Lumasaaba: Kumwenya kwe linambo lye Uganda kuli ni bisinza bitaru
Runyakore: Ekyeshongoro ky'eihanga rya Uganda kiine ebicweka bishatu.
Kiswahili: Wimbo wa kitaifa wa Uganda una stanzas tatu.

English: The independence day celebrations are done in October every year.
Acoli: Kwer me locken time i Dwe me Apar mwaka ducu.
Luganda: Ebijaguzo by'olunaku lw'ameefuga bibeerayo mu Gwekkumi gwa buli mwaka.
Lumasaaba: Kimikholo kye Khu khebulila khukhwiyawula kibawo mumwesi kwe likhumi buli mwiko
Runyakore: Omukoro gw'okujaguza ekiro ky'okwetegyeka nigubaho omu kwezi kw'aikumi buri mwaka.
Kiswahili: Maadhimisho ya Siku ya Uhuru hufanywa mnamo Oktoba kila mwaka.

English: This country has lost many important people over the years.
Acoli: Lobo man orwenyo dano mapol ma pirgi tego imwaka man.
Luganda: Eggwanga lino lifiiriddwako abantu bangi ab'enkizo mu myaka egiyise.
Lumasaaba: Linambo lino lyafilile babandu bekumukaso nabbi mu myakha kibirire
Runyakore: Eihanga eri rifeeriirwe abantu baingi b'obujunanizibwa emyaka ehingwireho.
Kiswahili: Nchi hii imepoteza watu wengi muhimu kwa miaka.

English: Our capital city is occupied by people from different parts of the country.
Acoli: Citiwa madit madit opong ki dano ma itwak lobo man mapatpat.
Luganda: Ekibuga kyaffe ekikulu kirimu abantu abava mu bitundu by'eggwanga eby'enjawulo.
Lumasaaba: Sirimba syefwe sikhulu silimo babandu babama buli luwande lwe linambo
Runyakore: Orurembo rwaitu rukuru nirutuurwamu abantu kuruga omu bicweka bingi by'eihanga.
Kiswahili: Mji mkuu wetu unamilikiwa na watu kutoka sehemu tofauti za nchi.

English: Currently, the elderly have a representative in the parliament.
Acoli: Kombedi jo ma otegi gitye ki lacungo pirgi i ot moko cik.
Luganda: Mu kaseera kano, abakadde balina omukiise mu lukiiko lw'eggwanga.
Lumasaaba: Aluno ari, babandu baangaale bali ni ubarangilila mu lukhikho lukhulu lwe linambo
Runyakore: Obwahati, abagurusi n'abakaikuru baine omujwekyerwa omu ishengyero ry'eihanga.
Kiswahili: Hivi sasa, wazee wana mwakilishi katika Bunge.

English: The ruling party has the majority representation in the parliament.
Acoli: Pati matye i loc tye ki lucungo madwong loyo i ot moko cik.
Luganda: Ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza kye kirina ababaka abasinga obungi mu lukiiko lw'eggwanga.
Lumasaaba: Lituuli lifura mubyekhurobola mwinambo nilyo liba ni bubwikhalilo bukali mu lukhikho lufuka linambo
Runyakore: Ekibiina ky'ebyobutegyeki ekirikwebembera eihanga nikyo kiine abajwekyerwa baingi omu ishengyero ry'eihanga.
Kiswahili: Chama tawala kina uwakilishi mwingi katika Bunge.

English: The sports council appointed a new coach for the national team.
Acoli: Kancil me tuku gucimu lapwony lutuku manyen pi tim me lobo man.
Luganda: Akakiiko k'ebyemizannyo kaalonze omutendesi wa ttiimu y'eggwanga omuggya.
Lumasaaba: Lukhikho lwe byekiminyawo lwangalee uyo utsa khu rangilila babenyaila linambo
Runyakore: Orukiiko orurikukurira eby'emizaano ruronzire omutendeki musya owa tiimu y'eihanga.
Kiswahili: Baraza la Michezo liliteua kocha mpya wa timu ya kitaifa.

English: In our community, the chairman deals with legal issues.
Acoli: Ikabedowa, wonkom tiyo ikom lok me cik.
Luganda: Mu kitundu kyaffe, ssentebe akwasaganya ensonga zonna ezeekuusa ku mateeka.
Lumasaaba: Mu syaloo syefwe, umukhulu we sisyalo niyo uramba khu bye kamakambila.
Runyakore: Omu kyanga kyaitu, mukuru w'entebe naakora aha bintu ebitarikuhenda biragiro.
Kiswahili: Katika jamii yetu, Mwenyekiti anashughulikia maswala ya kisheria.

English: Courts promote justice in the country.
Acoli: Kot ilo malo ngol matir i lobo man.
Luganda: Kkooti zitumbula obwenkanya mu ggwanga.
Lumasaaba: Kamakayilo niko kaka yeta khu rera bwangali mwinambo
Runyakore: Embuga z'amateeka nizireetaho oburingaaniza omu ihanga.
Kiswahili: Korti zinakuza haki nchini.

English: Our country participates in international sports every year.
Acoli: Lobowa bedo ituku atime ikin lobo mwaka ducu.
Luganda: Eggwanga lyaffe lyetaba mu byemizannyo ebiri ku ddaala ly'ensi yonna buli mwaka.
Lumasaaba: Linambo lyefwe litubila muminyawo kye sibala syosi buli mwakha
Runyakore: Buri mwaka, eihanga ryaitu niryejumba omu mizaano y'ensi yoona.
Kiswahili: Nchi yetu inashiriki katika michezo ya kimataifa kila mwaka.

English: Sports activities generate a lot of income these days.
Acoli: Tic me tuku kelo lim mapol mada ikare man.
Luganda: Ebyemizannyo bivaamu ssente nnyingi ensangi zino.
Lumasaaba: Byekiminyawo birera kamapesi kamakali lelo tsino
Runyakore: Eriigyenda, eby'emizaano nibireetaho entaasya mpango.
Kiswahili: Shughuli za michezo hutoa mapato mengi siku hizi.

English: Money is the major medium of exchange in the whole world.
Acoli: Cente aye lalok jami ma pire tek loyo i wilobo.
Luganda: Ssente ze zisinga okukozesebwa mu bugulanyi mu nsi yonna.
Lumasaaba: khurambisa kamapesi niyo ingeli ye khuukulana musibala syosi
Runyakore: Esente nizo zirikwejunisibwa omu kuhingaanisa eby'obuguzi omunsi yoona.
Kiswahili: Pesa ndio njia kuu ya kubadilishana katika ulimwengu wote.

English: Banks offer loans to people with securities.
Acoli: Bang miyo cente alega bot jo matye ki gin macung pire.
Luganda: Bbanka ziwola abantu abalina omusingo.
Lumasaaba: Birara bi bikha kamapesi bikopesa liwumule abo bali ni sinyala sabye imilila
Runyakore: Za banka nizihora abantu sente abaine eby'okusingayo.
Kiswahili: Benki hutoa mikopo kwa watu walio na usalama.

English: Their party is the strongest among all opposition political parties.
Acoli: Patigi aye tek loyo ikin pati ma pe cwako gamente.
Luganda: Ekibiina kyabwe kye kisinga amaanyi mu bibiina byonna ebiri ku ludda oluvuganya.
Lumasaaba: Siibina syabwe sye buwuli ate nga sili mwibyo bikhabisa linambo nisyo sifurayo kamani
Runyakore: Ekibiina kyabo nikyo kirikukizayo amaani omu bibiina byona  by'obutegyeki ebirikuhabura gavumenti.
Kiswahili: Chama chao ni nguvu kati ya vyama vyote vya siasa vya upinzani.

English: He is among the founder members of their political party.
Acoli: En tye ikin jo ma ocako patigi me cungo iwi bye.
Luganda: Ye omu ku bantu abaatandikawo ekibiina kyabwe.
Lumasaaba: Ali mutwela khubo babarakikhawo sirekere syebuwuli
Runyakore: N'omwe aha baatandikireho ekibiina kyabo ky'eby'obutegyeki.
Kiswahili: Yeye ni mmoja wa washiriki wa mwanzilishi wa chama chao cha siasa.

English: Mining is a profitable business in the whole world.
Acoli: Golo lonyo me tengom obedo biacara ma kelo magoba loyo i wilobo kulu.
Luganda: Okusima ebyobugagga eby'omu ttaka mulimu gwa ttunzi mu nsi yonna.
Lumasaaba: Khuyeba bye mwiloba sili sitwela khu bindu /burambi burera kamawumule kamafurisa musibala syosi
Runyakore: Okutimba eby'obugaiga bw'omu itaka n'omurimo ogurikureeta amagoba maingi omunsi yoona.
Kiswahili: Uchimbaji Madini ni biashara yenye faida katika ulimwengu wote.

English: Companies are supposed to give protective gears to the workers.
Acoli: Kampuni myero gimi ruk me gwoko kom bot lutic.
Luganda: Ebitongole birina okuwa abakozi baabyo ebintu eby'okwekuumisa.
Lumasaaba: Birekere byakha khuwa barambi babyo bikwaro bibi balinda nga sibakanile bukosi taa
Runyakore: Kampuni zishemereire kuheereza abakozi ebikozeso by'okwerindisa.
Kiswahili: Kampuni zinastahili kutoa gia za kinga kwa wafanyikazi.

English: Landslides cause a lot of deaths to people.
Acoli: Muk pa ngom kelo too madwong bot dano.
Luganda: Okukulugguka kw'ettaka kuviirako abantu nkumu okufa.
Lumasaaba: Tsikhururwe tsi rera khu fwa khwe babandu bakali
Runyakore: Okutenguka kw'eitaka nikwita abantu baingi.
Kiswahili: Maporomoko ya ardhi husababisha vifo vingi kwa watu.

English: The chairman addressed the residents about the current problems in the village.
Acoli: Wonkom oloko ki dano ikom peko ma kombedi tye i caro meno.
Luganda: Ssentebe yayogeddeko eri abatuuze ku bizibu ebiri ku kyalo ensangi zino.
Lumasaaba: Urangilila sisyalo abelekho ni nganikha isi babekhali khu buwangafu buli musyalo aluno ari
Runyakore: Mukuru w'entebe akashoboororera abatuuzi aha buremeezi oburi omu kyaro obwahati.
Kiswahili: Mwenyekiti aliwahutubia wakaazi juu ya shida za sasa katika kijiji.

English: The youths are the future leaders of our country.
Acoli: Bulu aye lutela me anyim pi lobowa.
Luganda: Abavubuka be bakulembeze b'eggwanga lyaffe mu biseera ebijja.
Lumasaaba: Basoleli nibo barangilisi be linambo lyefwe lye aburangisi
Runyakore: Eminyeeto nibo beebembezi b'eihanga  ryaitu aba nyensya.
Kiswahili: Vijana ni viongozi wa baadaye wa nchi yetu.

English: The previous presidential elections were so vibrant.
Acoli: Yero ladit lobo ma okatoni obedo lyet mada.
Luganda: Akalulu k'obukulembeze bw'eggwanga akawedde kaalimu ebbugumu lingi.
Lumasaaba: Khurobola khwo umurangilisi we linambo khukhwowele khwobelemo isuuya
Runyakore: Oburuuru obuhwaireho obw'okuronda mukuru w'eihanga bukaba bwine amaani.
Kiswahili: Uchaguzi wa rais wa zamani ulikuwa mzuri sana.

English: The sports council registers new clubs annually.
Acoli: Kancil me tuku coyo kilab manyen mwaka ki kwaka.
Luganda: Akakiiko k'ebyemizannyo kawandiisa ttiimu empya buli luvannyuma lwa mwaka.
Lumasaaba: Lukhikho lwe kiminyawo luwandikhisa bapisana atwela ate nga baburawa bulimwakh
Runyakore: Orukiiko orurikukurira emizaano omu ihanga niruhandiika ebibiina bisya  buri mwaka.
Kiswahili: Baraza la Michezo linasajili vilabu vipya kila mwaka.

English: Our country made sixty years of independence last year in October.
Acoli: Lobowa oo mwaka pyere abicel me locken imwaka ma okato i Dwe me Apar.
Luganda: Eggwanga lyaffe lyaweza emyaka nkaaga egy'ameefuga mu Gwekkumi gw'omwaka oguwedde.
Lumasaaba: Linambo lyefwe lye tabusile kimoko kasesaba nga linyala kumwiko kubirire mumwesi kwelikhumi
Runyakore: Omwaka oguhwaire omu kwezi kwaikumi, eihanga ryaitu rikamara emyaka nkaaga y'okwetegyeka.
Kiswahili: Nchi yetu ilifanya miaka sitini ya uhuru mwaka jana mnamo Oktoba.

English: There are many cultural leaders in our country.
Acoli: Lutela tekwaro pol mada i lobowa.
Luganda: Mu ggwanga lyaffe mulimu abakulembeze b'ennono bangi.
Lumasaaba: Aliwo barangilisi be bukuka bakali mwinambo lyefwe
Runyakore: Eihanga ryaitu ririmu abeebembezi baingi b'eby'obuhangwa.
Kiswahili: Kuna viongozi wengi wa kitamaduni katika nchi yetu.

English: Cultural leaders play a big role in promoting discipline within the community.
Acoli: Lutela tekwaro tye ki tic madit me ilo rwom me woro i kabedo moni.
Luganda: Abakulembeze b'ennono bakola omulimu munene mu kutumbula empisa mu kitundu.
Lumasaaba: Barangilisi be bikuka bali ni bikali byesi bakhola mukhukangafula besisyal
Runyakore: Abeebembezi b'eby'obuhangwa baine omurimo muhango  gw'okureetaho emicwe mirungi omu byanga byaitu.
Kiswahili: Viongozi wa kitamaduni wanachukua jukumu kubwa katika kukuza nidhamu ndani ya jamii.

English: Most of the national independence eyewitnesses are dead.
Acoli: Pol jo ma oneno nongo locken ki wang-gi dong gutoo woko.
Luganda: Abantu abasinga abaaliwo ku meefuga bafudde baweddewo.
Lumasaaba: Bababawo nga khufuna bunyalii bafura bukali bawumula/bafwa
Runyakore: Baakareebi abaingi bakafa.
Kiswahili: Mashuhuda wengi wa uhuru wamekufa.

English: The number of domestic investors increases every year.
Acoli: Wel lubiacara madongo mapaco mede mwaka ki mwaka.
Luganda: Omuwendo gwa bamusigansimbi gweyongera buli mwaka.
Lumasaaba: Babandu babetubile mu bye burambi bwe kamawumulu bali khuyimba buli mwiko
Runyakore: Abanyayuganda abarikubiika sente omu by'obugaiga ebirikureeta sente nibeeyongyera buri mwaka.
Kiswahili: Idadi ya wawekezaji wa ndani huongezeka kila mwaka.

English: Industries provide employment opportunities to people.
Acoli: Indactri kelo tic mapol bot dano.
Luganda: Amakolero gawa abantu emirmu.
Lumasaaba: Kamakholelo kasaalaa byeburambi isi babandu
Runyakore: Amakorero nigaheereza abantu emirimo.
Kiswahili: Viwanda hutoa fursa za ajira kwa watu.

English: There is a high rate of motorcycle theft in urban areas.
Acoli: Kwo pikipikitye lamal ikabedo me boma.
Luganda: Obubbi bwa bboodabooda bweriisa nkuuli mu bitundu ebiri mu kibuga.
Lumasaaba: Aliwo bubwifi bwe tsi piki piki mu birimba bubwiyongele
Runyakore: Obushuma bwa pikipiki nibweyongyera omu ndembo.
Kiswahili: Kuna kiwango cha juu cha wizi wa pikipiki katika maeneo ya mijini.

English: Motorcycles cause a lot of traffic jam in the city center.
Acoli: Pikipiki kelo pong pa gudu idye cwiny citi.
Luganda: Bboodabooda zireetawo omugotteko gw'ebidduka mu kibuga wakati.
Lumasaaba: Tsi piki piki tsi rerawo khusimama namwe khukenda mbola khwebitima atwela akari e sirimba sikhulu
Runyakore: Pikipiki nizireetaho omwijuzo gw'ebiiruka ahagati y'orurembo.
Kiswahili: Pikipiki husababisha trafiki nyingi katikati mwa jiji.

English: We had more than ten contestants for the presidential seat this year.
Acoli: Wabedo ki lucungo me bedo kom ladit lobo makato apar i mwakani.
Luganda: Twalina abantu abasukka mu kkumi abaavuganya ku kifo ky'obukulembeze bw'eggwanga omwaka guno.
Lumasaaba: Khwoba ni babekanisa indebbe ye burangilisi bwe linambo baminya likhumi mu khurobola kumwiko kuno
Runyakore: Omwaka ogu, tubaire twine abantu ikumi ababaire beesimbireho ahabwa mukuru w'eihanga.
Kiswahili: Tulikuwa na wagombea zaidi ya kumi kwa kiti cha rais mwaka huu.

English: This year's swearing-in ceremony had a small audience because of the pandemic.
Acoli: Dano obedo nok iwonge me dony i opici imwaka man pi two me loboni.
Luganda: Omukolo gw'okulayira ogw'omwaka guno gwaliko abantu batono olw'ekirwadde ssaanya.
Lumasaaba: Khukhwitsubisa umurangilisi we linambo kumwiko kuno khwo ba ni babandu bafwitti khulwe lukhenene
Runyakore: Omukoro gw'okurahira ogw'omwaka ogu gubaire guriho abantu bakye ahabw'omuzibwe.
Kiswahili: Sherehe ya kuapa ya mwaka huu ilikuwa na hadhira ndogo kwa sababu ya janga.

English: Maize prices have fallen this year.
Acoli: Wel lanywagi opoto i mwakani.
Luganda: Emiwendo gya kasooli gisse omwaka guno.
Lumasaaba: Kamakulana ka nasimya kakwile kumwiko kuno
Runyakore: Omwaka ogu, emihendo y'ebicoori eshuumire .
Kiswahili: Bei ya mahindi imeshuka mwaka huu.

English: Rural farmers have poor storage facilities for their harvest.
Acoli: Lupur ma i caro pe ki kagwoko kacgi maber.
Luganda: Abalimi b'omu byalo balina amaterekero g'ebirime ag'ekiboggwe.
Lumasaaba: Balimi be musyalo sibali ni birara bibi linda bi kesee bulayi taa
Runyakore: Abahingi b'omu byaro baine amabiikiro mabi g'ebihingwa byabo.
Kiswahili: Wakulima wa vijijini wana vifaa duni vya kuhifadhi kwa mavuno yao.

English: Water is very useful to people all over the world.
Acoli: Pii pire tek mada bot dano me wilobo kulu.
Luganda: Amazzi ga mugaso nnyo eri abantu okwetooloola ensi yonna.
Lumasaaba: Kametsi kali kekumukaso nabbi isi babandu musibala syosi
Runyakore: Amaizi ni kikuru munonga aha magara g'abantu omunsi yoona.
Kiswahili: Maji ni muhimu sana kwa watu ulimwenguni kote.

English: The government has constructed boreholes in many parts of the country.
Acoli: Gamente okwinyo tangi i kabedo mapatpat me loboni.
Luganda: Gavumenti ezimbye nayikondo mu bitundu by'eggwanga bingi.
Lumasaaba: Linambo lyombekhele bibyuma birusa kametsi khukhwama mwiloba mubifo bimalatane mwinambo
Runyakore: Gavumenti eyombekire amaizi ga rwecunda omu bicweka bingi by'eihanga.
Kiswahili: Serikali imeunda mashimo katika sehemu nyingi za nchi.

English: Rainfall is one of the main sources of water.
Acoli: Kot tye ikin jami madongo makelo pii.
Luganda: Enkuba y'emu ku nsulo z'amazzi enkulu.
Lumasaaba: Ifula ili khubitwela bibi khuwa/birera kamets
Runyakore: Enjura ni bumwe aha burugo bukuru bw'amaizi.
Kiswahili: Mvua ni moja wapo ya vyanzo kuu vya maji.

English: Several health centers in villages have unqualified workers.
Acoli: Odi yen mapol ata ikin gang tye ki lutic ma pe opwonye me timo tic meno.
Luganda: Amalwaliro agasinga mu byalo galina abakozi abatali batendeke.
Lumasaaba: bukangilo bukali musyalo sibuli ni bakangi balekele taa
Runyakore: Amarwariro maingi g'omu byaro tigaine bashaho batendekirwe.
Kiswahili: Vituo kadhaa vya afya katika vijiji vina wafanyikazi wasio na sifa.

English: A certain woman died while giving birth yesterday.
Acoli: Dako moni otoo ki nyodo laworo.
Luganda: Omukyala omu yafudde eggulo ng'azaala.
Lumasaaba: Aliwo umukyelema uwofwile ingoolobe ngali khusaala
Runyakore: Omukazi omwe afiire naazaara nyomwebazyo.
Kiswahili: Mwanamke fulani alikufa wakati akizaa jana.

English: Our country joined the United Nations in one thousand nine hundred sixty two.
Acoli: Lobowa  odonyo i United Nations i mwaka alip acel ki pyere abicel wiye aryo.
Luganda: Eggwanga lyaffe lyeyunga ku kakiiko k'amawanga amagatte mu 1962.
Lumasaaba: Linambo lyefwe lyetubasa khu ma nambo kali atwela mu mwiko sikana sitwela ni bimya syenda na kasesaba
Runyakore: Ensi yaitu ekeegaita aha mahanga geeteeraine rukumi rwenda nkaaga n'ebiri.
Kiswahili: Nchi yetu ilijiunga na Umoja wa Mataifa katika elfu moja mia tisa sitini na mbili.

English: The government distributed mosquito nets across the country to reduce the spread of malaria.
Acoli: Gamente opoko obwoo ober kaducu me dwoko nyaa pa maleria piny.
Luganda: Gavumenti yagaba obutimba bw'ensiri okwetooloola eggwanga okusobola okukendeeza okusaasaana kw'omusujja gw'ensiri.
Lumasaaba: Linambo lyekabile babandu butimba bwekhukonamo khukhwikhinga bulwale buburerebwa ni bikuntsyiu mwinambo lysoi
Runyakore: Gavumenti akagaba obutimba bw'ensiri omu ihanga ryona  kucendeeza aha kujanjara kw'oburweire bw'omushwija.
Kiswahili: Serikali ilisambaza nyavu za mbu kote nchini ili kupunguza kuenea kwa ugonjwa wa malaria.

English: Some pharmacies sell expired drugs.
Acoli: Ot cato yat mukene cato yen ma kargi okato woko.
Luganda: Amatundiro g'eddagala agamu gatunda eddagala eriyiseeko.
Lumasaaba: kamakulanilo ke kamalesi kamasambametsi kakandi kakulisa kamalesi kakatuma imbuka yako
Runyakore: Amaduuka g'emibazi agamwe nigaguza emibazi ehwaireho.
Kiswahili: Maduka mengine ya dawa huuza dawa za kumalizika muda.

English: My friend works for a television company.
Acoli: Larema tiyo ikampuni me telebijon.
Luganda: Mukwano gwange akolera kitongole kya terefayina.
Lumasaaba: Umusale wase arambila khu telefaina
Runyakore: Munywani wangye naakora aha kampuni ya tiivi
Kiswahili: Rafiki yangu anafanya kazi kwa kampuni ya runinga.

English: Fire outbreaks cause losses to business owners.
Acoli: Wang pa mac atura kelo rwenyo pa lonyo ki icing wegi biacara.
Luganda: Omuliroogukwata ebizimbe guleetera bannannyini bbiizineesi okufiirizibwa.
Lumasaaba: Kumulilo kukhali kumwirkekhele kwonekesa bye kamakulana
Runyakore: Okubarukaho kw'omuriro nikureetera bakama ba bizinesi baafeerwa.
Kiswahili: Kuvunja moto husababisha hasara kwa wamiliki wa biashara.

English: Electricity in our area is unstable.
Acoli: Mac i kabedowa pe bedo.
Luganda: Amasannyalaze mu kitundu ky'ewaffe gavaavaako.
Lumasaaba: Kumunyakasi mu sisinza syefwe kutumbukhamo
Runyakore: Omu kyaro kyaitu, amashanyarazi nigakira kurugarugaho.
Kiswahili: Umeme katika eneo letu hauna msimamo.

English: Police plays an important role in keeping order among citizens.
Acoli: Abili tiyo tic mapire tek me gwoko bedo maber ikin dano me lobo moni.
Luganda: Ppoliisi ekola omulimu munene okukuuma obutebenkevu mu bannansi.
Lumasaaba: Balinda lukoosi bali ni syesi bakhola sikali khubona nga babandu si bali mubisayumba taa
Runyakore: Pooriisi neekora omurimo muhango omu kureetaho obutebeekana omu batuuragye.
Kiswahili: Polisi wana jukumu muhimu katika kuweka utaratibu kati ya raia.

English: Women enjoy playing netball in our country.
Acoli: Mon nongo mit pa tuku netbol i lobowa.
Luganda: Abakazi banyumirwa nnyo omuzannyo gw'okubaka omupiira mu ggwanga lyaffe.
Lumasaaba: Bakhasi basangalila mumwinyawo kwe khu kaama mwinambo lyefwe
Runyakore: Omu ihanga ryaitu, abakazi nibakunda kuzaana omupiira gw'engaro.
Kiswahili: Wanawake wanafurahiya kucheza mpira wa wavu katika nchi yetu.

English: Universities promote students' talents through sports and games.
Acoli: Yunivaciti ilo malo diro pa lutino kwan ki tuku mapatpat.
Luganda: Ssettendekero zitumbula ebitone by'abayizi nga ziyita mu byemizannyo.
Lumasaaba: Kamalekelo ke angaki kapilisa ate kayeta babana bali ni bilabo bye burawa muminyawo ki kesemulisa ni ki khakesemulisa taa
Runyakore: Za univaasite nizitunguura entaranta z'abeegi kurabira omu mizaano.
Kiswahili: Vyuo vikuu vinakuza vipaji vya wanafunzi kupitia michezo na michezo.

English: The electoral commission registers new political parties every presidential term.
Acoli: Dul ma Loyo Yer coyo pati manyen ikare ducu me yero ladit lobo.
Luganda: Akakiiko k'ebyokulonda kawandiika ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi ebipya buli kisanja kya bwa pulezidenti.
Lumasaaba: Lituuli li yila bye khurobola mwinambo liwandikhisa kamatuuli ke byebuwuli kamaya buli mwiko aali khurobola khwe umurangilisi we linamb
Runyakore: Ekitongore kya gavumenti ekirikukurira oburuuru omu ihanga  nikihandiika ebibiina bisya by'ebyobutegyeki  buri ncuro y'okuronda mukuru w'eihanga.
Kiswahili: Tume ya uchaguzi inasajili vyama vipya vya siasa kila muhula wa rais.

English: People are free to join any political party of their choice.
Acoli: Dan tye agonya me donyo i pati ma gimito.
Luganda: Abantu balina eddembe okwegatta ku kibiina ky'ebyobufuzi kye baagala.
Lumasaaba: Babandu bali be lukoosi khu khwitubasa mu matuli ke byebuwuli kosi kesi bandikanile khukhwitubasamo
Runyakore: Abantu nibaikirizibwa kwegaita aha kibiina ky'eby'obutegyeki eki barikwenda.
Kiswahili: Watu wako huru kujiunga na chama chochote cha siasa cha chaguo lao.

English: No one is above the law in this country.
Acoli: Pe tye ngat mo ma kato cik ilobo man.
Luganda: Tewali ali waggulu wa mateeka mu ggwanga lino.
Lumasaaba: Mbawo uli angaki e kamakambila kakayila linambo lino ta
Runyakore: Omu ihanga eri, tihaine ori ahaiguru y'ebiragiro.
Kiswahili: Hakuna mtu aliye juu ya sheria katika nchi hii.
